title: 85/102/EEC: Commission Decision of 21 December 1984 on the final payment of the Community financial participation for 1984 in inspection and surveillance operations in the maritime waters of Ireland (Only the English text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
of 21 December 1984
on the final payment of the Community financial participation for 1984 in inspection and surveillance operations in the maritime waters of Ireland
(Only the English text is authentic)
(85/102/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN
COMMUNITIES
main_body: The final payment of the Community financial participation in eligible expenditure incurred by Ireland in respect of 1984 is hereby fixed at 2 005 400,74 ECU.
This final payment shall be paid on the conditions laid down in Article 1 of Decision 78/640/EEC.
This Decision is addressed to Ireland.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 21 December 1984.
